author: Aydnlk
title: Ground News - The 76th episode 2 preview of Three Sisters has been released! “I fell in love with you, Derya!”
text: The second teaser of the 76th episode of the series Üç Kız Kardeş, based on the same named novel by İclal Aydın, which broke sales records, will be released on Saturday, February 2. In the new episode, Kartal confesses his love for Derya. What will he do facing Derya's reaction? Summary by Aydınlık 1 Articles 1 Articles All Left Center Right [] Aydınlık The 76th episode 2 preview of Three Sisters has been released! “I fell in love with you, Derya!” The second teaser of the 76th episode of the series Üç Kız Kardeş, based on the same named novel by İclal Aydın, which broke sales records, will be released on Saturday, February 2. In the new episode, Kartal confesses his love for Derya.
